title: Cup, "Rose and Mask", 1923
markings: Marks: On underside: hammer, sickle, cog, 1919 stamped in green underglaze; 81/66, 1923 hand-painted in black overglaze
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
creditline: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
description: Cylindrical, with rounded bottom, slightly flaring to lip, loop handle withmolded foliate pattern at joining to body; painted with black and gilded rose blossom, leaves, grotesque mask around sides; thin gilded and black band around rim

tombstone.epitaph:
Cup, "Rose and Mask", 1923.
1923. porcelain, enamel, gilding. The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1989-41-65.
